activities: lynda.com provides online training and educational courses and materials, via its subscription-based Online Training Library® ("OTL").  Subscribers to certain lynda.com OTL services  or products, may provide personally identifiable information to authenticate log-in and/or pay for the subscription. lynda.com will use such personally identifiable information to provide the specific service to the customer, and will collect, store, and treat such information, in accordance  with its Privacy Policy.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: lynda.com collects information from users of the lynda.com service.  This information may or may not include personally identifiable information depending on the type of service accessed.  Users of the website may also provide personally identifiable information if they provide feedback or comments;  users are responsible for such user-generated communications or content.
